EYB:ForceStance.NAME: Force Stance
DESCRIPTION: #g+2 #gStrength, NL #r-1 #rFocus, NL #r-1 #rDexterity. NL On Enter: #yBoost #yForce. NL On Exit: Gain 3 #yTemp. #yHP.

EYB:AgilityStance.NAME: Agility Stance
DESCRIPTION: #g+2 #gDexterity, NL #r-1 #rStrength, NL #r-1 #rFocus. NL On Enter: #yBoost #yAgility. NL On Exit: Draw 1 card next turn.

EYB:IntellectStance.NAME: Intellect Stance
DESCRIPTION: #g+2 #gFocus, NL #r-1 #rStrength, NL #r-1 #rDexterity. NL On Enter: #yBoost #yIntellect. NL On Exit: Randomly gain [F], [A] or [I].
